description:
This course covers how to get started with Microsoft Access 2013. Students will learn how to launch Access 2013 and open a database, understand the Windows components, learn about queries, use reports, create and save a simple Access 2013 database. This course is taught by Sandra Batakis.

Total Video Time: 1h 19m

Enjoyed what you saw? What to learn more about Microsoft Office Access 2013?

Check out the full Microsoft Office Access 2013 Basics Course
title: Access 2013 - Getting Started
